text:
@Acyn If both these people lose someone very dear to them, as a result of the #coronavirus, it would be no less than what they deserve.

 Perhaps the self-professed "Christian" @IngrahamAngle should reflect over Prov 24: 16-18 while she smiles mockingly at those ill with the virus. https://t.co/351xm5AnOY
